com.yahoo.sketches.quantiles

Class UnionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.sketches.quantiles.UnionBuilder

  • public class UnionBuilder
extends Object
    For building a new QuantilesSketch Union operation.
    Author:
    Lee Rhodes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnionBuilder() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Union build()
      Returns a virgin Union object
      Union build(Memory srcMem)
      Returns a Union object that has been initialized with the data from the given Memory image of a QuantilesSketch.
      Union build(QuantilesSketch sketch)
      Returns a Union object that has been initilized with the given sketch to be used as a union target and will be modified.
      Union copyBuild(QuantilesSketch sketch)
      Returns a Union object that has been initilized with the data from the given sketch.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnionBuilder

        public UnionBuilder()

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public Union build()
        Returns a virgin Union object
        Returns:
        a virgin Union object

      • build

        public Union build(QuantilesSketch sketch)
        Returns a Union object that has been initilized with the given sketch to be used as a union target and will be modified. If you do not want the given sketch to be modified use the copyBuild(QuantilesSketch).
        Parameters:
        sketch - a QuantilesSketch that will be used as a target of subsequent union operations.
        Returns:
        a Union object

      • build

        public Union build(Memory srcMem)
        Returns a Union object that has been initialized with the data from the given Memory image of a QuantilesSketch. A reference to this Memory image is not retained.
        Parameters:
        srcMem - a Memory image of a QuantilesSketch
        Returns:
        a Union object

      • copyBuild

        public Union copyBuild(QuantilesSketch sketch)
        Returns a Union object that has been initilized with the data from the given sketch.
        Parameters:
        sketch - A QuantilesSketch to be used as a source of data, but will not be modified.
        Returns:
        a Union object
